org.bytemechanics.logger

Class FluentLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bytemechanics.logger.FluentLogger

  • public final class FluentLogger
extends Object
    Simple logging system to log to java logging with more user friendly manner
    Since:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    afarre

    • Method Detail

      • getLoggerFactory

        protected static LoggerFactoryAdapter getLoggerFactory()
        Get the current LoggerFactoryAdapter instance
        Returns:
        the default LoggerFactoryAdapter instance or the configured as system property buy LOGGER_FACTORY_ADAPTER_KEY
        See Also:
        LOGGER_FACTORY_ADAPTER_KEY

      • child

        public final FluentLogger child(String _suffix)
        Get NEW fluent logger instance with the current logger name suffixed with the given name using the current logger prefixes and arguments
        Parameters:
        _suffix - logger name
        Returns:
        fluent logger instance using the current logger prefixes and arguments

      • prefixed

        public FluentLogger prefixed(String _prefix)
        Get NEW fluent logger instance with the given name, adds the _prefix to any message
        Parameters:
        _prefix - prefix to append at the begining of any message writen to this log and after any previous prefix at this logger
        Returns:
        fluent logger instance

      • with

        public FluentLogger with(Object... _initialArgs)
        Get NEW fluent logger instance from class canonincal name, adds the _prefix to any message using the _initialArgs as first replacement parameters
        Parameters:
        _initialArgs - replacement values to add as placeholders for any message written, is appended at the end of any other arguments at this logger
        Returns:
        fluent logger instance

        Return the current prefix
        Returns:

        Since:

        Return the current prefix arguments
        Returns:

      • log

        public FluentLogger log(Log _log)
        Allows send the given _log to the underlying logger API if the log level is enabled
        Parameters:
        _log - log to send
        Returns:
        same FluentLogger instance

      • log

        public FluentLogger log(Level _level,
                        String _message,
                        Object... _args)
        Allows send the given _message replacing the _args prefixed with any previous registered prefix and arguments to the underlying logger API
        Parameters:
        _level - log level
        _message - log message
        _args - log replacement arguments with the pattern '{}'
        Returns:
        same FluentLogger instance

      • log

        public FluentLogger log(Level _level,
                        Supplier<String> _messageSupplier,
                        Throwable _exception)
        Allows send the given _messageSupplier and the _exception to the underlying logger API
        Parameters:
        _level - log level
        _messageSupplier - log message supplier
        _exception - log throwable attachment
        Returns:
        same FluentLogger instance

        Returns:
